fnc.feedback.selected.wildmagic.conditio: The condition of the selected Wild Magic was not fulfilled!
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.damage: The maximum damage dealt to affected targets.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.magnitud: Strength of wild magic that will affect the target.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.duration: The duration of the wild magic that will affect the target.
fnc:components/wild_damage.desc.precisio: Makes the damage trend more towards average numbers.
event.fnc.faction_ally_wild: You feel the unpredictability of the magic around you, uniting with you.  You have allied yourself with the Wilde Courts!
